# ðŸ§ª Night Theme - Visual Testing Log

#### Issue #19: .text-muted too faint/dark
**Element:** `.text-muted` class used throughout app
**Problem:** CSS variable `--text-muted: #8b92a3` is too dark/faint on dark backgrounds, making muted text hard to read.

User feedback: "troppo fievole sto grigio"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Changed CSS variable from `#8b92a3` (gray medium) to `#a8b0bf` (gray lighter):
```css
--text-muted: #a8b0bf;  /* Was #8b92a3 */
```

Lighter gray improves readability while maintaining "muted" appearance.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica .text-muted piÃ¹ leggibile

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

- Browser: Chrome/Firefox

[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

After override:

- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

}

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

```

After override:

- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

}

}
```

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

}

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],

[data-theme="night"] textarea {

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

}

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

```html

```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {

  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {

  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;

}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

- Inline `style="background: white"` not caught (keyword, not rgb)

[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],

- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

  background-color: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

```html

```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

```css

  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;

}
```

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

After override:

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style

```html

```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {

  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],

[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

```html

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {

  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

}

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],

}

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**Problem:** CSS variable `--text-muted: #8b92a3` is too dark/faint on dark backgrounds, making muted text hard to read.

User feedback: "troppo fievole sto grigio"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Changed CSS variable from `#8b92a3` (gray medium) to `#a8b0bf` (gray lighter):
```css
--text-muted: #a8b0bf;  /* Was #8b92a3 */
```

Lighter gray improves readability while maintaining "muted" appearance.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica .text-muted piÃ¹ leggibile

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

  --bs-accordion-btn-color: var(--text-primary) !important;

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

    font-size: 0.95rem;

**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**Root Cause:** Child elements inside .accordion-body don't inherit color properly or have hardcoded dark colors.

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],

}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */

After override:

}

}
```

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {

  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],

  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

```html

```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

```css

}

  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;

}
```

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css

}

}
```

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #20: Generic inputs white background
**Element:** `input[type="text"]` and other input types without `.form-control` class
**Problem:** Inputs with only inline styles (no `.form-control` class) render with white background:

**HTML Example:**
```html
<input type="text" placeholder="Cerca regioni..." value=""   style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 36px; border: 1px solid rgb(222, 226, 230); ...">
```

No background specified â†’ browser default white background.

User feedback: "troppo bianco"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="password"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="search"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="number"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="tel"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="url"],
[data-theme="night"] textarea {
  background: var(--bg-dark-tertiary) !important;
  border-color: var(--border-medium) !important;
  color: var(--text-primary) !important;
}

/* Plus placeholder and focus states */
```

All input types now dark regardless of whether they have `.form-control` class.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica inputs scuri ovunque

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

**Test Result:** Ricarica e verifica cards con bordi e ombre visibili

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;

}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

**HTML Example:**
```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.

Added comprehensive input type overrides:
```css
[data-theme="night"] input[type="text"],
[data-theme="night"] input[type="email"],

}

#### Issue #21: Box-shadow and borders disappeared
**Element:** `div` with inline `box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` style
**Problem:** When inline background changed from white to dark, black box-shadow became invisible.

```html
<div style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);   box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 1px 3px; ...">
```

After override:
- Background â†’ dark âœ“
- Box-shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.1) â†’ invisible on dark âœ—
- No border â†’ card blends with background âœ—

User feedback: "sono spariti bordo e tutto"

**Status:** âœ… FIXED

**Fix Applied:**
```css
[data-theme="night"] div[style*="box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"] {
  box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}

  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08) !important;
  border: 1px solid var(--border-dark) !important;
}
```

Replace black box-shadow with white/light shadow + add border for separation.
